Gallery Ad

Skip ad in seconds Skip Ad

HTML

									
										<div class="gallery__ad">
  <div id="gallery__ad-container" data-bind="adContainer">
    <div  class="ad-placeholder ad-refresh" id="ad-gallery_interstitial_ad" data-id="gallery_interstitial_ad" data-type="regular"></div>
  </div>
  <span class="skip-ad" data-bind="visible: $parent.adTimer.isActive()">Skip ad in <span class="skip-ad-count" data-bind="text: $parent.adTimer.secondsElapsed"></span> seconds</span>
  <a class="skip-ad skip-ad-link" href="<?php print $next_slide_url; ?>"
    data-bind="visible: !$parent.adTimer.isActive(),
                click: $parent.skipAdSlide">Skip Ad</a>
</div>

Gallery Body

Start
Dan Colonna

This is a slide title!

Here is some caption content, yay!
By Eva Gonzalez June, 6, 2016
Sweet and juicy tomatoes are the star here. We have a recipe collection that features this summer's showstopper.

There's so much to love about these seasonal beauties. When summer is here, put down the cans and head to the farmer's market for fresh tomato flavor that can't be beat. From rustic sauces to salsas, we can't stop dreaming up new ways to enjoy fresh tomatoes.

Start Slideshow
This pattern contains: organisms-article-text organisms-gallery organisms-gallery-header-bottom organisms-gallery-listicle organisms-related-content

HTML

									
										<div class="gallery__body article__body">


    

    

        
          <div class="gallery" data-js-component="gallery" data-config="galleryConfig" data-bind="swipeLeft: gotoNextSlide, swipeRight: gotoPrevSlide, leftArrowPress: gotoPrevSlide,rightArrowPress: gotoNextSlide">
          
            <div class="gallery__slide" data-bind="css: slideMediaType">
                    <div class="gallery-controls">
                      <a href="http://previous.com" class="gallery-controls__btn gallery-controls__btn--prev"
                          data-bind="click: gotoPrevSlide,
                                      clickBubble: false,
                                      visible: !isTitleCardVisible(),
                                      css: {'is-disabled' : pauseGallery()}">
                        <svg class="gallery-controls__btn-icon gallery-controls__btn-icon--prev">
                          <use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="/assets/img/symbols.svg#icon-gallery-arrow-prev"></use>
                        </svg>
                      </a>
                      <a href="http://previous.com" class="gallery-controls__btn gallery-controls__btn--next"
                          data-bind="click: gotoNextSlide,
                                      clickBubble: false,
                                      css: {
                                        'is-disabled' : pauseGallery(),
                                        'gallery-controls__btn--start': isTitleCardVisible()
                                      }">
                        <span class="gallery-controls__btn-start-text" data-bind="visible: isTitleCardVisible()">Start</span>
                        <svg class="gallery-controls__btn-icon gallery-controls__btn-icon--next">
                          <use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="/assets/img/symbols.svg#icon-gallery-arrow-next"></use>
                        </svg>
                      </a>
                    </div>
                <div class="gallery__media" data-bind="template: { if: currentSlide, name: templateType, data: currentSlide()}, css: slideMediaType">
          
                      <img class="gallery__image" src="http://placehold.it/300x300" alt="This is some alt text" data-pin-no-hover="true" data-bind="attr: {src: image, alt: altText}" />          
          
          
                </div>
          
                <!-- ko if: isGalleryContentSlide -->
                <!-- /ko -->
              </div>
        
                  <div class="gallery-meta">
                    <div class="gallery-counter" data-bind="if: isGalleryActive && isGalleryContentSlide">
                    </div>
                    <div class="media__credit" data-bind="text: currentSlide().imageCredit">Dan Colonna</div>
                  </div>
        
              <!-- ko if: isGalleryActive -->
                <!-- ko if: isNotOutroSlide -->
                <div class="gallery-caption" data-bind="with: currentSlide">
                  <div class="gallery-caption__header">
                    <h2 class="gallery__slide-title" data-bind="html: title">This is a slide title!</h2>
                  </div>
                  <div class="gallery-caption__body" data-bind="html: caption">
                    Here is some caption content, yay!
                  </div>
                </div>
                <!-- /ko -->
              <!-- /ko -->
          
              <!-- ko if: isTitleCardVisible() -->
                <div class="gallery-description">
                
                  <div class="article__meta ">
                      <div class="article__meta-byline">
                        
                          <a class="byline" href="http://example.com" >
                            <img class="byline__media" src="http://placehold.it/45x45" alt="">
                            <div class="byline__text" >
                              By
                              <span class="byline__author">Eva Gonzalez</span>
                                <span class="byline__date">June, 6, 2016</span>
                            </div>
                          </a>
                        
                      </div>
                      <div class="article__meta-share show-at-md">
                      </div>
                  </div>
                
                  <div class="article__lead">
                      Sweet and juicy tomatoes are the star here. We have a recipe collection that features this summer's showstopper.
                  </div>
                
                  <div class="gallery-description__content">
                    <p>There's so much to love about these seasonal beauties. When summer is here, put down the cans and head to the farmer's market for fresh tomato flavor that can't be beat. From rustic sauces to salsas, we can't stop dreaming up new ways to enjoy fresh tomatoes.</p>
                
                    <a href="#" class="btn link-with-arrow btn--start" data-bind="click: gotoNextSlide, clickBubble: false">Start Slideshow</a>
                  </div>
                </div>
              <!-- /ko -->
          </div>
        
          <script type="text/html" id="image-slide-template">
            <img class="gallery__image" src="" alt="" data-pin-no-hover="true" data-bind="attr: {src: image, alt: altText}" />          </script>
        
          <script type="text/html" id="video-slide-template">
            <div class="gallery__video">
              <div style="display:none"></div>
              
              <object type="application/x-shockwave-flash" data="http://c.brightcove.com/services/viewer/federated_f9?&amp;width=640&amp;height=360&amp;flashID=myExperience-1&amp;wmode=opaque&amp;bgcolor=%23FFFFFF&amp;playerID=2444926739001&amp;playerKey=AQ~~%2CAAAAABxHNRc~%2C2PQy55JIF_GMqcUDrm_IeQ8yTdYMQ0Fj&amp;includeAPI=true&amp;templateLoadHandler=bcTemplateLoaded&amp;templateReadyHandler=brightcove%5B%22templateReadyHandlermyExperience-1%22%5D&amp;isVid=true&amp;%40videoPlayer=4493023517001&amp;isUI=true&amp;dynamicStreaming=true&amp;linkBaseURL=h&amp;autoStart=&amp;debuggerID=&amp;originalTemplateReadyHandler=onTemplateReady&amp;startTime=1445291546823" id="myExperience-1" width="640" height="360" class="BrightcoveExperience brightcove-field-embed" seamlesstabbing="undefined"><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="always"><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"><param name="seamlessTabbing" value="false"><param name="swliveconnect" value="true"><param name="wmode" value="opaque"><param name="quality" value="high"><param name="bgcolor" value="#FFFFFF"></object>
            </div>          </script>
        
          <script type="text/html" id="ad-slide-template">
            <div class="gallery__ad">
              <div id="gallery__ad-container" data-bind="adContainer">
                <div  class="ad-placeholder ad-refresh" id="ad-gallery_interstitial_ad" data-id="gallery_interstitial_ad" data-type="regular"></div>
              </div>
              <span class="skip-ad" data-bind="visible: $parent.adTimer.isActive()">Skip ad in <span class="skip-ad-count" data-bind="text: $parent.adTimer.secondsElapsed"></span> seconds</span>
              <a class="skip-ad skip-ad-link" href="<?php print $next_slide_url; ?>"
                data-bind="visible: !$parent.adTimer.isActive(),
                            click: $parent.skipAdSlide">Skip Ad</a>
            </div>          </script>
        
          <script type="text/html" id="outro-slide-template">
          </script>
        




</div>

Gallery Caption

This is a slide title!

Here is some caption content, yay!

  </div>

Gallery Controls

Start

HTML

									
										<div class="gallery-controls">
  <a href="#" class="gallery-controls__btn gallery-controls__btn--prev"
      data-bind="click: gotoPrevSlide,
                  clickBubble: false,
                  visible: !isTitleCardVisible(),
                  css: {'is-disabled' : pauseGallery()}">
    <svg class="gallery-controls__btn-icon gallery-controls__btn-icon--prev">
      <use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="/assets/img/symbols.svg#icon-gallery-arrow-prev"></use>
    </svg>
  </a>
  <a href="#" class="gallery-controls__btn gallery-controls__btn--next"
      data-bind="click: gotoNextSlide,
                  clickBubble: false,
                  css: {
                    'is-disabled' : pauseGallery(),
                    'gallery-controls__btn--start': isTitleCardVisible()
                  }">
    <span class="gallery-controls__btn-start-text" data-bind="visible: isTitleCardVisible()">Start</span>
    <svg class="gallery-controls__btn-icon gallery-controls__btn-icon--next">
      <use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="/assets/img/symbols.svg#icon-gallery-arrow-next"></use>
    </svg>
  </a>
</div>

Gallery Description

By Eva Gonzalez June, 6, 2016
Sweet and juicy tomatoes are the star here. We have a recipe collection that features this summer's showstopper.

There's so much to love about these seasonal beauties. When summer is here, put down the cans and head to the farmer's market for fresh tomato flavor that can't be beat. From rustic sauces to salsas, we can't stop dreaming up new ways to enjoy fresh tomatoes.

            </div>

      </div>
  </div>

      Sweet and juicy tomatoes are the star here. We have a recipe collection that features this summer's showstopper.
  </div>

O, summer... enjoy with us the sweet taste of fruits and lucious crunch of vegetables.

There's so much to love about these seasonal beauties. When summer is here, put down the cans and head to the farmer's market for fresh tomato flavor that can't be beat. From rustic sauces to salsas, we can't stop dreaming up new ways to enjoy fresh tomatoes.

Heather started with a nagi garland, which you can buy from a florist, and then wired in coontie palm and holly fern fronds as well as crookneck gourds. Pedestal urns planted with crotons allow room below for pumpkins. This colorful houseplant is ideal for outdoor use where frost comes late (the Lower, Coastal, and Tropical South). For an unexpected flourish, set pumpkins atop holly fern fronds and tuck in sprigs of yaupon holly berries.","image": "http://i.imgur.com/ojEJAtR.jpg","altText": "This is some alt text","imageCredit": "Stevie Wonder","metaLink": {"url": "http://example.com","text": "Link Text"},"url": "slide-5-url"}, {"browserTitle": "Browser Title #6","type": "image","title": "Create A Warm Welcome","caption": "Pick a few branches of colorful fall leaves, and arrange simply in a tall glass vase filled with water. From this bold focal point, build out the rest of your tabletop display. Gather an array of seasonal gourds in a mix of colors, sizes, and textures for variety. Stack flat gourds of graduated sizes, and top with a large glass cloche (available at crafts stores or online). Fill another smaller glass cloche with bleached pinecones, and invert; we used it to top one of our flatter pumpkins, but feel free to improvise. Add a potted plant (we used a small olive tree) to the arrangement for texture. Heather started with a nagi garland, which you can buy from a florist, and then wired in coontie palm and holly fern fronds as well as crookneck gourds. Pedestal urns planted with crotons allow room below for pumpkins. This colorful houseplant is ideal for outdoor use where frost comes late (the Lower, Coastal, and Tropical South). For an unexpected flourish, set pumpkins atop holly fern fronds and tuck in sprigs of yaupon holly berries.","image": "http://i.imgur.com/ojEJAtR.jpg","altText": "This is some alt text","imageCredit": "Stevie Wonder","metaLink": {"url": "http://example.com","text": "Link Text"},"url": "slide-5-url"}, {"browserTitle": "Browser Title #6","type": "image","title": "Create A Warm Welcome","caption": "Pick a few branches of colorful fall leaves, and arrange simply in a tall glass vase filled with water. From this bold focal point, build out the rest of your tabletop display. Gather an array of seasonal gourds in a mix of colors, sizes, and textures for variety. Stack flat gourds of graduated sizes, and top with a large glass cloche (available at crafts stores or online). Fill another smaller glass cloche with bleached pinecones, and invert; we used it to top one of our flatter pumpkins, but feel free to improvise. Add a potted plant (we used a small olive tree) to the arrangement for texture. Place small gourds around the larger items, and scatter more bright fall leaves along the table.","image": "http://i.imgur.com/mr3S7yy.jpg","altText": "This is some alt text","imageCredit": "Stevie Wonder","metaLink": {"url": "http://example.com","text": "Link Text"},"url": "slide-6-url"}, {"browserTitle": "Browser Title #7","type": "image","title": "Pomegranate and Arugula Pizza","caption": "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Gallery Sidebar

This pattern contains: molecules-ads-300x250

HTML

									
										 
     <div class="ad ad-mtac ad-350x250 show-at-sm" id="ad-300x350-0000001"></div>
<script>
  var tgx_ad_callback_ad_300x350_0000001 = function (event, sizes, breakpoint, oldBreakpoint) {
      if (event === 'render' && this.id == 'ad-300x350-0000001') {
      }
      else if (event === 'remove') {
      }
      else if (event === 'rendered') {
      }
  };

  tgx_ad_slots.push(function(ads){
      ads.addSlot({
          id: 'ad-300x350-0000001',
          responsive: {
              md: {sizes: ['300x250'], callback: tgx_ad_callback_ad_300x350_0000001 },
              lg: {sizes: ['300x250'], callback: tgx_ad_callback_ad_300x350_0000001 },
              xl: {sizes: ['300x250'], callback: tgx_ad_callback_ad_300x350_0000001 }
          },

          position: 0000001,
          defer: 150,
          trackview: true
      });

  });
</script>

Gallery

Start
1/23
Dan Colonna

This is a slide title!

Here is some caption content, yay!
By Eva Gonzalez June, 6, 2016
Sweet and juicy tomatoes are the star here. We have a recipe collection that features this summer's showstopper.

There's so much to love about these seasonal beauties. When summer is here, put down the cans and head to the farmer's market for fresh tomato flavor that can't be beat. From rustic sauces to salsas, we can't stop dreaming up new ways to enjoy fresh tomatoes.

Start Slideshow
This pattern contains: organisms-gallery-controls organisms-gallery-image organisms-gallery-video organisms-gallery-ad molecules-social-share organisms-gallery-meta organisms-gallery-caption organisms-gallery-description organisms-gallery-endslate organisms-gallery-json

HTML

									
										
  <div class="gallery" data-js-component="gallery" data-config="galleryConfig" data-bind="swipeLeft: gotoNextSlide, swipeRight: gotoPrevSlide, leftArrowPress: gotoPrevSlide,rightArrowPress: gotoNextSlide">
  
    <div class="gallery__slide" data-bind="css: slideMediaType">
            <div class="gallery-controls">
              <a href="#" class="gallery-controls__btn gallery-controls__btn--prev"
                  data-bind="click: gotoPrevSlide,
                              clickBubble: false,
                              visible: !isTitleCardVisible(),
                              css: {'is-disabled' : pauseGallery()}">
                <svg class="gallery-controls__btn-icon gallery-controls__btn-icon--prev">
                  <use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="/assets/img/symbols.svg#icon-gallery-arrow-prev"></use>
                </svg>
              </a>
              <a href="#" class="gallery-controls__btn gallery-controls__btn--next"
                  data-bind="click: gotoNextSlide,
                              clickBubble: false,
                              css: {
                                'is-disabled' : pauseGallery(),
                                'gallery-controls__btn--start': isTitleCardVisible()
                              }">
                <span class="gallery-controls__btn-start-text" data-bind="visible: isTitleCardVisible()">Start</span>
                <svg class="gallery-controls__btn-icon gallery-controls__btn-icon--next">
                  <use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="/assets/img/symbols.svg#icon-gallery-arrow-next"></use>
                </svg>
              </a>
            </div>
        <div class="gallery__media" data-bind="template: { if: currentSlide, name: templateType, data: currentSlide()}, css: slideMediaType">
  
              <img class="gallery__image" src="http://placehold.it/300x300" alt="This is some alt text" data-pin-no-hover="true" data-bind="attr: {src: image, alt: altText}" />  
  
  
        </div>
  
        <!-- ko if: isGalleryContentSlide -->
        <!-- /ko -->
      </div>

          <div class="gallery-meta">
            <div class="gallery-counter" data-bind="if: isGalleryActive && isGalleryContentSlide">
          		<span data-bind="text: currentSlideNum">1</span>/<span data-bind="text: totalSlideCount">23</span>
            </div>
            <div class="media__credit" data-bind="text: currentSlide().imageCredit">Dan Colonna</div>
          </div>

      <!-- ko if: isGalleryActive -->
        <!-- ko if: isNotOutroSlide -->
        <div class="gallery-caption" data-bind="with: currentSlide">
          <div class="gallery-caption__header">
            <h2 class="gallery__slide-title" data-bind="html: title">This is a slide title!</h2>
          </div>
          <div class="gallery-caption__body" data-bind="html: caption">
            Here is some caption content, yay!
          </div>
        </div>
        <!-- /ko -->
      <!-- /ko -->
  
      <!-- ko if: isTitleCardVisible() -->
        <div class="gallery-description">
        
          <div class="article__meta ">
              <div class="article__meta-byline">
                
                  <a class="byline" href="http://example.com" >
                    <img class="byline__media" src="http://placehold.it/45x45" alt="">

                      <span class="byline__author">Eva Gonzalez</span>

          </div>
        
          <div class="gallery-description__content">

            <a href="#" class="btn link-with-arrow btn--start" data-bind="click: gotoNextSlide, clickBubble: false">Start Slideshow</a>
          </div>
        </div>
      <!-- /ko -->
  </div>

    <div class="gallery__video">
      <div style="display:none"></div>

  <script type="text/html" id="ad-slide-template">
    <div class="gallery__ad">
      <div id="gallery__ad-container" data-bind="adContainer">
        <div  class="ad-placeholder ad-refresh" id="ad-gallery_interstitial_ad" data-id="gallery_interstitial_ad" data-type="regular"></div>
      </div>
      <span class="skip-ad" data-bind="visible: $parent.adTimer.isActive()">Skip ad in <span class="skip-ad-count" data-bind="text: $parent.adTimer.secondsElapsed"></span> seconds</span>
      <a class="skip-ad skip-ad-link" href="<?php print $next_slide_url; ?>"
        data-bind="visible: !$parent.adTimer.isActive(),
                    click: $parent.skipAdSlide">Skip Ad</a>
    </div>  </script>

  <script type="text/html" id="outro-slide-template">
      <div class="gallery__outro-slide">
          <div class="gallery__outro-content ad-outbrain">
            <div class="g-wrap">
              <div class="ad-outbrain outbrain_widget_endslate" hidden-src="http://www.cookinglight.com/healthy-living/weight-loss/calorie-myths" hidden-widget-id="AR_13" hidden-ob-template="cookinglight" ></div>
            </div>
          </div>
      
        <div class="gallery__outro-content">
          <div class="g-wrap">
              <div class="gallery__outro-content-title">More Slideshow</div>
                <div class="g-span-xs-6 g-span-sm-6">
                  <div class="story-card">
                    <div class="story-card__media">
                      <a href="#" class="story-card__link">
                        <div class="media-wrap">
                          <img src="http://placehold.it/255x170" alt="alt text">
                        </div>
                      </a>
                    </div>
                    <div class="story-card__body">
                      <span class="story-card__category">Everyday Menu</span>
                      <a href="#" class="story-card__title">Summertime Gazpacho Recipes</a>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                </div>
                <div class="g-span-xs-6 g-span-sm-6">
                  <div class="story-card">
                    <div class="story-card__media">
                      <a href="#" class="story-card__link">
                        <div class="media-wrap">
                          <img src="http://placehold.it/255x170" alt="alt text">

                      </a>
                    </div>

      </div>
  </script>

From this bold focal point, build out the rest of your tabletop display. Gather an array of seasonal gourds in a mix of colors, sizes, and textures for variety. Stack flat gourds of graduated sizes, and top with a large glass cloche (available at crafts stores or online). Fill another smaller glass cloche with bleached pinecones, and invert; we used it to top one of our flatter pumpkins, but feel free to improvise. Add a potted plant (we used a small olive tree) to the arrangement for texture.     This pattern contains: organisms-story-card organisms-story-card-two-up organisms-package-section-inner

    This pattern contains: molecules-tag

    HTML

    Well Done

    This pattern contains: organisms-article-lead

    HTML

    Scrolling Desktop Nav

    Search
    This pattern contains: molecules-menu-bar-menu-icon molecules-site-logo molecules-menu-bar-search organisms-search-bar

    HTML

    									
										<div class="show-at-md">
  <div class="site-header__bar site-header__menu-bar is-fixed is-hidden is-scrolling" id="scrollNav"
        data-js-component="scrollingNav"
        data-nav-target="#scrollNav"
        data-init-width="1024px"
        data-scroll-target=".homepage-hero">

    <div class="site-header__wrap ">
      <div class="menu-bar">

        <div class="menu-bar__section menu-bar__menu menu-bar__menu--solid"
          data-js-component="sideMenuToggle"
          data-menu-target=".site-menu"
          data-menu-overlay-class="site-menu-overlay"
          data-close-trigger=".site-menu__close, .site-menu-overlay">

        </div>

        <div class="menu-bar__section site-header__logo site-header__logo--alt">
            <a href="">

<script>
  var tgx_ad_callback_ad_300x350 = function (event, sizes, breakpoint, oldBreakpoint) {
      if (event === 'render' && this.id == 'ad-300x350') {
      }
      else if (event === 'remove') {
      }
      else if (event === 'rendered') {
      }
  };

  tgx_ad_slots.push(function(ads){
      ads.addSlot({
          id: 'ad-300x350',
          responsive: {
              md: {sizes: ['300x250'], callback: tgx_ad_callback_ad_300x350 },
              lg: {sizes: ['300x250'], callback: tgx_ad_callback_ad_300x350 },
              xl: {sizes: ['300x250'], callback: tgx_ad_callback_ad_300x350 }
          },

          position: 1,
          defer: 150,
          trackview: true
      });

  });
</script>

    Search Input Field

    HTML

    									
										  <input class="form-control search-bar__input" type="text" placeholder="Search" >

    Search Results Card
    How to Carve a Chicken with cats watching
    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur dolar site adipiscing elit...
    92 Ratings
    hard
    This pattern contains: molecules-social-share molecules-content-rating

    HTML

<script>
  var tgx_ad_callback_ad_300x350 = function (event, sizes, breakpoint, oldBreakpoint) {
      if (event === 'render' && this.id == 'ad-300x350') {
      }
      else if (event === 'remove') {
      }
      else if (event === 'rendered') {
      }
  };

  tgx_ad_slots.push(function(ads){
      ads.addSlot({
          id: 'ad-300x350',
          responsive: {
              md: {sizes: ['300x250'], callback: tgx_ad_callback_ad_300x350 },
              lg: {sizes: ['300x250'], callback: tgx_ad_callback_ad_300x350 },
              xl: {sizes: ['300x250'], callback: tgx_ad_callback_ad_300x350 }
          },

          position: 1,
          defer: 150,
          trackview: true
      });

  });
</script>

                md: ['82x18']
            },

<script>


    var tgx_ad_callback_ad_300x50_0000001 = function (event, sizes, breakpoint, oldBreakpoint) {
        if (event === 'render' && this.id == 'ad-300x50-0000001') {

        }
        else if (event === 'remove') {

        }
        else if (event === 'rendered') {

        }
    };

    tgx_ad_slots.push(function(ads){

        ads.addSlot({
            id: 'ad-300x50-0000001',
            responsive: {
                sm: {sizes: ['300x50','320x50'], callback: tgx_ad_callback_ad_300x50_0000001 }
            },
            
            position: 0000001,
            defer: 150
        });

    });

</script>    </div>

    This pattern contains: molecules-ads-leaderboard-flex organisms-action-bar organisms-search-bar-with-options organisms-site-nav organisms-glance-bar organisms-site-menu

    HTML

    									
										<header class="site-header has-glance-bar">
  <div class="site-header__bar site-header__menu-bar" data-js-component="stickyNav" >

        <div class="ad-wrapper ad-leaderboard ad-bg-lite ad-wrapper--with-padding show-at-sm" >
          <div class="ad ad-leaderboard" id="ad-728x90_970x250_970x90_101x1_320x50_ATF"></div>
            <script>
            
            
                var tgx_ad_callback_ad_leaderboard_responsive = function (event, sizes, breakpoint, oldBreakpoint) {
                    var body = document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0];
                    var className = 'has-leaderboard';
                    if (event === 'render' && this.id == 'ad-728x90_970x250_970x90_101x1_320x50_ATF') {
                        if (body.classList) {
                            body.classList.add(className);
                        }
                        else {
                            body.className += ' ' + className;
                        }
                    }
                    else if (event === 'remove') {
            
                        if (body.classList) {
                            body.classList.remove(className);
                        }
                        else {
                            body.className = body.className.replace(new RegExp('(^|\\b)' + className.split(' ').join('|') + '(\\b|$)', 'gi'), ' ');
                        }
            
                    }
                    else if (event === 'rendered') {
            
                    }
                };
            
                tgx_ad_slots.push(function(ads){
            
                    ads.addSlot({
                        id: 'ad-728x90_970x250_970x90_101x1_320x50_ATF',
                        responsive: {
                            md: {sizes: ['728x90','101x1'], callback: tgx_ad_callback_ad_leaderboard_responsive },
                            lg: {sizes: ['728x90','101x1'], callback: tgx_ad_callback_ad_leaderboard_responsive },
                            xl: {sizes: ['728x90','101x1'], callback: tgx_ad_callback_ad_leaderboard_responsive }
                        },
                        position: 1
                    });
            
                });
            
            </script>
        </div>

    <div class="site-header__top">
      <div class="site-header__wrap ">
        <div class="menu-bar">
          <div class="menu-bar__section menu-bar__menu"
              data-js-component="sideMenuToggle"
              data-menu-target=".site-menu"
              data-menu-overlay-class="site-menu-overlay"
              data-close-trigger=".site-menu__close, .site-menu-overlay">

          </div>

    Action Bar

    Next
    This pattern contains: molecules-social-share

    HTML

    									
										<div class="action-bar">
  <div class="site-header__wrap site-header__wrap--centered">
    <div class="action-bar__section action-bar__social">
        <div class="social-share ">
            <a target="_blank" href="foo.com" class="social-share__item social-share__item--facebook " >
              <svg class="social-share__icon social-share__icon--facebook">
                 <use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="/assets/img/symbols.svg#icon-facebook"></use>              </svg>
            </a>
            <a target="_blank" href="foo.com" class="social-share__item social-share__item--pinterest " >
              <svg class="social-share__icon social-share__icon--pinterest">
                 <use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="/assets/img/symbols.svg#icon-pinterest"></use>              </svg>
            </a>
            <a target="_blank" href="foo.com" class="social-share__item social-share__item--twitter " >
              <svg class="social-share__icon social-share__icon--twitter">
                 <use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="/assets/img/symbols.svg#icon-twitter"></use>              </svg>
            </a>
            <a target="_blank" href="foo.com" class="social-share__item social-share__item--email " >
              <svg class="social-share__icon social-share__icon--email">
                 <use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="/assets/img/symbols.svg#icon-email"></use>              </svg>
            </a>
            <a target="_blank" href="foo.com" class="social-share__item social-share__item--sms " >
              <svg class="social-share__icon social-share__icon--sms">
                 <use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="/assets/img/symbols.svg#icon-sms"></use>              </svg>
            </a>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="action-bar__section action-bar__next">
      <a href="#" class="action-bar__link link-with-arrow ">
        Next
      </a>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

    Glance Bar

    In Season
    Subscribe
    This pattern contains: molecules-ads-cm-header-menu

    HTML

    									
										<div class="site-header__bar hide-at-md">
  <div class="site-header__wrap">
    <div class="glance-bar">
      <div class="glance-bar__section">
          <a class="glance-bar__link" href="http://foo.com">
            In Season
          </a>
      </div>
      <div class="glance-bar__section">
          <a class="glance-bar__link glance-bar__link--dark" target="_blank" href="http://bar.com">
            Subscribe
          </a>
        <div id="ad-header-menu"></div>
<script>
    tgx_ad_slots.push(function(ads){
        ads.addSlot({
            id: 'ad-header-menu',
            responsive: {
                sm: ['82x18'],
                md: ['82x18']
            },
            params: {
                
                cmpos: "globalhdrsublnk",
                cmtyp: "text"
            },
            cm: true,
            priority: 3
        });
    });
</script>
        
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

                <a target="_blank" href="foo.com" class="social-share__item social-share__item--pinterest " >

    Search Bar With Options

    Popular Searches:

    • New Chicken Recipes
    • 30-minute Meils
    • In-Season Diets
    This pattern contains: organisms-search-input-field organisms-search-terms organisms-term-filters

    HTML

    									
										<div class="search-bar search-bar--with-options search-bar--in-site-header "
>
  <div class="search-bar__wrap"
    >
    <form class="form-inline search-form" action="/">
      
        <input class="form-control search-bar__input" type="text" placeholder="Search" >      
      <div class="autocomplete-container"></div>

      <button class="btn form-btn link-with-arrow search-bar__btn">
        Search
      </button>
    </form>

      <div class="search-terms">
        <h3 class="term-set__title">Popular Searches:</h3>
          <ul class="term-set">
              <li class="term-set__term-item"><a href="http://foo.com" class="term-set__term">
  New Chicken Recipes
</a></li>
              <li class="term-set__term-item"><a href="http://foo.com" class="term-set__term">
  30-minute Meils
</a></li>
              <li class="term-set__term-item"><a href="http://foo.com" class="term-set__term">
  In-Season Diets
</a></li>
          </ul>
      </div>

  </div>
</div>

    HTML

    									
										<div class="site-menu">
  <div class="site-menu__header">
    <a class="site-menu__logo" href="/">
      <svg class="icon icon-logo">
        <use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="/assets/img/symbols.svg#icon-ckl-logo"></use>      </svg>
    </a>
    <div class="site-menu__close">
     <svg class="icon icon-close">
       <use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="/assets/img/symbols.svg#icon-close"></use>
     </svg>
    </div>
  </div>
  <div class="site-menu__content">
    <div class="site-menu__search">
      <div class="search-bar  search-bar--in-side-nav"
>
        <div class="search-bar__wrap"
          >
          <form class="form-inline search-form" action="/">
      
              <input class="form-control search-bar__input" type="text" placeholder="Search" >      
            <button class="btn form-btn link-with-arrow search-bar__btn">
              Search
            </button>
          </form>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>

    <div class="menu-group menu-group__primary"
      data-js-component="menuAccordian"
      data-accordion-panel=".menu-group__list-item"
      data-accordion-content=".menu-group__sub-menu"
      data-accordion-trigger=".menu-group__sub-menu-trigger">
      <ul class="menu-group__list">
          <li class="menu-group__list-item menu-group__list-item--with-menu">

                </svg>
              </span>

                    <li class="menu-group__sub-menu-item"><a href="http://bar.com" class="menu-group__link menu-group__sub-menu-link">Foo</a></li>

    Site Nav Subscribe

<script>
    tgx_ad_slots.push(function(ads){
        ads.addSlot({
            id: 'ad-4x1',
            responsive: {
                lg: ['4x1'],
                xl: ['4x1']
            },
            params: {
                
                cmpos: "globalnavsubhvr",
                cmtyp: "tout"
            },
            cm: true,
            priority: 3
        });
    });
</script>

    Get healthy recipes in your inbox, plus special offers.

    Privacy
    News Highly-Processed Carbs May Double Risk for Certain Cancers
    Food and Drink A Week of Healthy Dinners—April 4-8
    This pattern contains: organisms-story-card organisms-simple-subscribe

    HTML

    									
										<div class="collage">

  <div class="collage__column">
      <div class="collage__item ">
        <div class="story-card   has-social-share  story-card--collage">
          <div class="story-card__media">
            <a href="" class="story-card__link">
                <div class="media-wrap">
                  <img src="http://placehold.it/338x450" alt="This is a media alt text">
                </div>
                <svg class="icon icon-badge story-card__badge">
                  <use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="/assets/img/symbols.svg#icon-badge-staff"></use>
                </svg>
            </a>
        
        
              <div class="story-card__share">
                <div class="social-share ">
                    <a target="_blank" href="foo.com" class="social-share__item social-share__item--pinterest " data-img-src="http://placehold.it/338x450">
                      <svg class="social-share__icon social-share__icon--pinterest">
                         <use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="/assets/img/symbols.svg#icon-pinterest"></use>                      </svg>
                    </a>
                    <a target="_blank" href="foo.com" class="social-share__item social-share__item--facebook " data-img-src="http://placehold.it/338x450">

                         <use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="/assets/img/symbols.svg#icon-facebook"></use>                      </svg>
                    </a>
                </div>
              </div>
          </div>

              <span class="story-card__category">Food and Drink</span>

          </div>
        </div>

      </div>

          </div>
        
          <div class="story-card__body">
              <span class="story-card__category">Food and Drink</span>
        
            <a href="" class="story-card__title">A Week of Healthy Dinners—April 4-8</a>
        
        
        
          </div>
        </div>

      </div>
  </div>
  <div class="collage__column">
      <div class="collage__item ">
        <div class="story-card   has-social-share  story-card--collage">
          <div class="story-card__media">
            <a href="" class="story-card__link">
                <div class="media-wrap">
                  <img src="http://placehold.it/338x450" alt="This is a media alt text">
                </div>
                <svg class="icon icon-badge story-card__badge">
                  <use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="/assets/img/symbols.svg#icon-badge-staff"></use>
                </svg>
            </a>
        
        
              <div class="story-card__share">
                <div class="social-share ">
                    <a target="_blank" href="foo.com" class="social-share__item social-share__item--pinterest " data-img-src="http://placehold.it/338x450">
                      <svg class="social-share__icon social-share__icon--pinterest">
                         <use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="/assets/img/symbols.svg#icon-pinterest"></use>                      </svg>
                    </a>
                    <a target="_blank" href="foo.com" class="social-share__item social-share__item--facebook " data-img-src="http://placehold.it/338x450">

                         <use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="/assets/img/symbols.svg#icon-facebook"></use>                      </svg>

          </div>

          <div class="story-card__media">

          </div>
        </div>

          <div class="simple-subscribe__content">

    Story Card Two Up

    Eat Clean
    Food and Drink How to Make Superfast Dinner Salads Make them now!
    Food and Drink How to Make Superfast Dinner Salads How to Make Superfast Dinner Salads Make them now!
    Food and Drink How to Make Superfast Dinner Salads Make them now!
    Food and Drink How to Make Superfast Dinner Salads Make them now!
    See All Eat Clean
    This pattern contains: molecules-accent-header organisms-story-card

    HTML

    									
										<div class="accent-header">
  <h2 class="accent-header__title"><span class="accent-header__title-text">Eat Clean</span></h1>
</div>
<div class="g-wrap story-card-two-up">
  <div class="story-card-wrap g-span-xs-12 g-span-sm-6">
      <div class="story-card   has-social-share  ">
        <div class="story-card__media">
          <a href="" class="story-card__link">
              <div class="media-wrap">
                <img src="http://placehold.it/1020x574" alt="This is a media alt text">
              </div>
          </a>
      
      
            <div class="story-card__share">
              <div class="social-share ">
                  <a target="_blank" href="foo.com" class="social-share__item social-share__item--pinterest " data-img-src="http://placehold.it/1020x574">
                    <svg class="social-share__icon social-share__icon--pinterest">
                       <use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="/assets/img/symbols.svg#icon-pinterest"></use>                    </svg>
                  </a>
                  <a target="_blank" href="foo.com" class="social-share__item social-share__item--facebook " data-img-src="http://placehold.it/1020x574">
                    <svg class="social-share__icon social-share__icon--facebook">
                       <use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="/assets/img/symbols.svg#icon-facebook"></use>                    </svg>
                  </a>
              </div>
            </div>
        </div>
      
        <div class="story-card__body">
            <span class="story-card__category">Food and Drink</span>
      
          <a href="" class="story-card__title">How to Make Superfast Dinner Salads</a>
      
      
            <a class="link-with-arrow link-with-arrow--accent" href="">Make them now!</a>
      
        </div>
      </div>
  </div>

          </a>

                  </a>
              </div>
            </div>
        </div>
      
        <div class="story-card__body">
            <span class="story-card__category">Food and Drink</span>

              </div>
          </a>

    Story Card Two Up Video

    Eat Clean

    Food and Drink How to Make Superfast Dinner Salads Make them now!
    Food and Drink How to Make Superfast Dinner Salads Make them now!
    See All Eat Clean
    This pattern contains: molecules-accent-header organisms-story-card

    HTML

    									
										<div class="accent-header">
  <h2 class="accent-header__title"><span class="accent-header__title-text">Eat Clean</span></h1>
</div>
<div class="g-wrap story-card-two-up">
  <div class="story-card-wrap g-span-xs-12 g-span-sm-6">
      <div class="story-card   has-social-share  ">
        <div class="story-card__media">
          <a href="" class="story-card__link">
              <div class="media-wrap">
                <img src="http://placehold.it/1020x574" alt="This is a media alt text">
              </div>
          </a>
      
      
            <div class="story-card__share">
              <div class="social-share ">
                  <a target="_blank" href="foo.com" class="social-share__item social-share__item--pinterest " data-img-src="http://placehold.it/1020x574">
                    <svg class="social-share__icon social-share__icon--pinterest">
                       <use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="/assets/img/symbols.svg#icon-pinterest"></use>                    </svg>
                  </a>
                  <a target="_blank" href="foo.com" class="social-share__item social-share__item--facebook " data-img-src="http://placehold.it/1020x574">
                    <svg class="social-share__icon social-share__icon--facebook">
                       <use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="/assets/img/symbols.svg#icon-facebook"></use>                    </svg>
                  </a>
              </div>
            </div>
        </div>
      
        <div class="story-card__body">
            <span class="story-card__category">Food and Drink</span>

    Story Card
    Food and Drink How to Make Superfast Dinner Salads Make them now!
    This pattern contains: molecules-jumpstart-video molecules-social-share

    HTML

    									
										<div class="story-card   has-social-share  ">
  <div class="story-card__media">
    <a href="" class="story-card__link">
        <div class="media-wrap">
          <img src="http://placehold.it/1020x574" alt="This is a media alt text">
        </div>
        <svg class="icon icon-badge story-card__badge">
          <use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="/assets/img/symbols.svg#icon-badge-staff"></use>
        </svg>
    </a>


      <div class="story-card__share">
        <div class="social-share ">
            <a target="_blank" href="foo.com" class="social-share__item social-share__item--pinterest " data-img-src="http://placehold.it/1020x574">
              <svg class="social-share__icon social-share__icon--pinterest">
                 <use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="/assets/img/symbols.svg#icon-pinterest"></use>              </svg>
            </a>
            <a target="_blank" href="foo.com" class="social-share__item social-share__item--facebook " data-img-src="http://placehold.it/1020x574">
              <svg class="social-share__icon social-share__icon--facebook">
                 <use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="/assets/img/symbols.svg#icon-facebook"></use>              </svg>
            </a>
        </div>
      </div>
  </div>

  <div class="story-card__body">
      <span class="story-card__category">Food and Drink</span>

    <a href="" class="story-card__title">How to Make Superfast Dinner Salads</a>


      <a class="link-with-arrow link-with-arrow--accent" href="">Make them now!</a>

      <div class="ad ad-170x30" id="ad-sponsor"></div>
<script>
    tgx_ad_slots.push(function(ads){
        ads.addSlot({
            id: 'ad-sponsor',
            width: 170,
            height: 30,
            
        });
    });
</script>
  </div>
</div>

    Story Card Featured Video

    Food and Drink How to Make Superfast Dinner Salads
    O summer... Celebrate with us the sweet joys of fruits and the luscious crunch of vegetables.
    Make them now!
    This pattern contains: molecules-jumpstart-video molecules-social-share

    HTML

    									
										<div class="story-card  story-card--featured has-social-share  ">
  <div class="story-card__media">

      <div class="jumpstart-wrapper" style="width:100%;display:block;position:relative;">
          <video width="100%"
              height="100%"
               data-disable-plugindev="false"
              
              data-viewplay="false"
               data-autoplay="false"
              
               controls 
                  data-account="1260616200"
                  data-video-id="5232427197001"
                  data-player="HyesZSISA"
                  data-embed="default"
                  data-application-id
                  class="video-js"
                  ></video>
              <script src="//cdn.video.timeinc.com/jumpstart/v1/js/jumpstart.min.js"></script>
          <div class="embed-caption media__text media__caption">
              
          </div>
      </div>
      

      <div class="story-card__share">
        <div class="social-share ">
            <a target="_blank" href="foo.com" class="social-share__item social-share__item--pinterest " >
              <svg class="social-share__icon social-share__icon--pinterest">
                 <use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="/assets/img/symbols.svg#icon-pinterest"></use>              </svg>
            </a>
            <a target="_blank" href="foo.com" class="social-share__item social-share__item--facebook " >
              <svg class="social-share__icon social-share__icon--facebook">
                 <use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="/assets/img/symbols.svg#icon-facebook"></use>              </svg>
            </a>
        </div>
      </div>
  </div>

  <div class="story-card__body">
      <span class="story-card__category">Food and Drink</span>

    <a href="" class="story-card__title">How to Make Superfast Dinner Salads</a>

      <div class="story-card__content">
          O summer... Celebrate with us the sweet joys of fruits and the luscious crunch of vegetables.
      </div>

      <a class="link-with-arrow link-with-arrow--accent" href="">Make them now!</a>

      <div class="ad ad-170x30" id="ad-sponsor"></div>
<script>
    tgx_ad_slots.push(function(ads){
        ads.addSlot({
            id: 'ad-sponsor',
            width: 170,
            height: 30,
            
        });
    });
</script>
  </div>
</div>

    Story Card Featured
    Food and Drink How to Make Superfast Dinner Salads
    O summer... Celebrate with us the sweet joys of fruits and the luscious crunch of vegetables.
    Make them now!
    This pattern contains: molecules-jumpstart-video molecules-social-share

    HTML

    									
										<div class="story-card  story-card--featured has-social-share  ">
  <div class="story-card__media">
    <a href="" class="story-card__link">
        <div class="media-wrap">
          <img src="http://placehold.it/1020x574" alt="This is a media alt text">
        </div>
        <svg class="icon icon-badge story-card__badge">
          <use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="/assets/img/symbols.svg#icon-badge-staff"></use>
        </svg>
    </a>


      <div class="story-card__share">
        <div class="social-share ">
            <a target="_blank" href="foo.com" class="social-share__item social-share__item--pinterest " data-img-src="http://placehold.it/1020x574">
              <svg class="social-share__icon social-share__icon--pinterest">
                 <use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="/assets/img/symbols.svg#icon-pinterest"></use>              </svg>
            </a>
            <a target="_blank" href="foo.com" class="social-share__item social-share__item--facebook " data-img-src="http://placehold.it/1020x574">
              <svg class="social-share__icon social-share__icon--facebook">
                 <use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="/assets/img/symbols.svg#icon-facebook"></use>              </svg>
            </a>
        </div>
      </div>
  </div>

  <div class="story-card__body">
      <span class="story-card__category">Food and Drink</span>

    <a href="" class="story-card__title">How to Make Superfast Dinner Salads</a>

      <div class="story-card__content">
          O summer... Celebrate with us the sweet joys of fruits and the luscious crunch of vegetables.
      </div>

      <a class="link-with-arrow link-with-arrow--accent" href="">Make them now!</a>

      <div class="ad ad-170x30" id="ad-sponsor"></div>
<script>
    tgx_ad_slots.push(function(ads){
        ads.addSlot({
            id: 'ad-sponsor',
            width: 170,
            height: 30,
            
        });
    });
</script>
  </div>
</div>

    Story Card Horizontal
    Food and Drink How to Make Superfast Dinner Salads Make them now!
    This pattern contains: molecules-jumpstart-video molecules-social-share

    HTML

    									
										<div class="story-card story-card--horizontal  has-social-share  ">
  <div class="story-card__media">
    <a href="" class="story-card__link">
        <div class="media-wrap">
          <img src="http://placehold.it/1020x574" alt="This is a media alt text">
        </div>
        <svg class="icon icon-badge story-card__badge">
          <use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="/assets/img/symbols.svg#icon-badge-staff"></use>
        </svg>
    </a>


      <div class="story-card__share">
        <div class="social-share ">
            <a target="_blank" href="foo.com" class="social-share__item social-share__item--pinterest " data-img-src="http://placehold.it/1020x574">
              <svg class="social-share__icon social-share__icon--pinterest">
                 <use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="/assets/img/symbols.svg#icon-pinterest"></use>              </svg>
            </a>
            <a target="_blank" href="foo.com" class="social-share__item social-share__item--facebook " data-img-src="http://placehold.it/1020x574">
              <svg class="social-share__icon social-share__icon--facebook">
                 <use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="/assets/img/symbols.svg#icon-facebook"></use>              </svg>
            </a>
        </div>
      </div>
  </div>

  <div class="story-card__body">
      <span class="story-card__category">Food and Drink</span>

    <a href="" class="story-card__title">How to Make Superfast Dinner Salads</a>


      <a class="link-with-arrow link-with-arrow--accent" href="">Make them now!</a>

      <div class="ad ad-170x30" id="ad-sponsor"></div>
<script>
    tgx_ad_slots.push(function(ads){
        ads.addSlot({
            id: 'ad-sponsor',
            width: 170,
            height: 30,
            
        });
    });
</script>
  </div>
</div>

    Story Card Video

    Food and Drink How to Make Superfast Dinner Salads Make them now!
    This pattern contains: molecules-jumpstart-video molecules-social-share

    HTML

    									
										<div class="story-card   has-social-share  ">
  <div class="story-card__media">

      <div class="jumpstart-wrapper" style="width:100%;display:block;position:relative;">
          <video width="100%"
              height="100%"
               data-disable-plugindev="false"
              
              data-viewplay="false"
               data-autoplay="false"
              
               controls 
                  data-account="1260616200"
                  data-video-id="5232427197001"
                  data-player="HyesZSISA"
                  data-embed="default"
                  data-application-id
                  class="video-js"
                  ></video>
              <script src="//cdn.video.timeinc.com/jumpstart/v1/js/jumpstart.min.js"></script>
          <div class="embed-caption media__text media__caption">
              
          </div>
      </div>
      

      <div class="story-card__share">
        <div class="social-share ">
            <a target="_blank" href="foo.com" class="social-share__item social-share__item--pinterest " >
              <svg class="social-share__icon social-share__icon--pinterest">
                 <use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="/assets/img/symbols.svg#icon-pinterest"></use>              </svg>
            </a>
            <a target="_blank" href="foo.com" class="social-share__item social-share__item--facebook " >
              <svg class="social-share__icon social-share__icon--facebook">
                 <use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="/assets/img/symbols.svg#icon-facebook"></use>              </svg>
            </a>
        </div>
      </div>
  </div>

  <div class="story-card__body">
      <span class="story-card__category">Food and Drink</span>

    <a href="" class="story-card__title">How to Make Superfast Dinner Salads</a>


      <a class="link-with-arrow link-with-arrow--accent" href="">Make them now!</a>

      <div class="ad ad-170x30" id="ad-sponsor"></div>
<script>
    tgx_ad_slots.push(function(ads){
        ads.addSlot({
            id: 'ad-sponsor',
            width: 170,
            height: 30,
            
        });
    });
</script>
  </div>
</div>

    Body Markup

    BODY this is markup /BODY

    HTML

    									
										
    <b>BODY this is markup /BODY</b>

    Body Structured Expanded

    BODY RENDERING CONTENT this is content 1 RENDERING IMAGE - - RENDERING IMAGE - this is image 2 - this is image 2 RENDERING CONTENT this is content 2

    HTML

    									
										BODY

    


        RENDERING CONTENT
        this is content 1


    


        RENDERING IMAGE -  -
        
            <img src="" alt="alt text" />

    


        RENDERING IMAGE - this is image 2 -
        this is image 2

    


        RENDERING CONTENT
        this is content 2

    Body Structured

    RENDERING CONTENT this is content 1 RENDERING IMAGE RENDERING IMAGE this is image 2 RENDERING CONTENT this is content 2 RENDERING IMAGE this is image 3 RENDERING CONTENT this is content 3

    HTML

    									
										
    

        RENDERING CONTENT
        this is content 1

    

        RENDERING IMAGE
        
            <img src="" alt="alt text" />

    

        RENDERING IMAGE
        this is image 2

    

        RENDERING CONTENT
        this is content 2

    

        RENDERING IMAGE
        this is image 3

    

        RENDERING CONTENT
        this is content 3

    Body

    HTML

    Imagetest

    HTML

    Test1

    test

    HTML

    									
										    test

    Texttest

    HTML

        ads.addSlot({

    Article Full

    This pattern contains: organisms-article-header organisms-article-body

    HTML

    									
										<article class="article">
    <header class="article__header">
        
    
        
        
    </header>

    <div class="article__body">
      <div class="show-at-md article__social-share">
      </div>
    
    </div>

</article>

    Article

    • Food
    • In Season
    • Summer Produce Guide

    Summer Produce Guide for the greatest summer ever

    By Eva Gonzalez June, 6, 2016
    O, summer... enjoy with us the sweet taste of fruits and lucious crunch of vegetables.

    Healthy Summer Produce ¼

    For anyone who enjoys food and cooking, summer offers the finest ingredients—fresh local produce from the garden, farmers' market, and grocery—to make any dish superlative. The key is to keep things simple and let the quality of seasonal ingredients shine through. It's so easy, enjoyable, and affordable to indulge your cravings for fresh fruits and vegetables this time of year.

    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.

    John Doe
    Cooking Class Video: Grilling
    Tomato and Avocado Stack Get the recipe
    Orange and Avocado Stack Get the recipe
    Grape and Avocado Stack Get the recipe

    You May Like

    category name Heirloom Tomato and Avocado Stack Favorite Summer Salads
    category name How to Make Superfast Dinner Salads buy now
    patrick's category Chunky Tomato-Fruit Gazpacho Favorite Summer Salads

    Healthy Summer Produce

    For anyone who enjoys food and cooking, summer offers the finest ingredients—fresh local produce from the garden, farmers' market, and grocery—to make any dish superlative. The key is to keep things simple and let the quality of seasonal ingredients shine through. It's so easy, enjoyable, and affordable to indulge your cravings for fresh fruits and vegetables this time of year.

    Healthy Summer Produce

    For anyone who enjoys food and cooking, summer offers the finest ingredients—fresh local produce from the garden, farmers' market, and grocery—to make any dish superlative. The key is to keep things simple and let the quality of seasonal ingredients shine through. It's so easy, enjoyable, and affordable to indulge your cravings for fresh fruits and vegetables this time of year.

    Healthy Summer Producez

    For anyone who enjoys food and cooking, summer offers the finest ingredients—fresh local produce from the garden, farmers' market, and grocery—to make any dish superlative. The key is to keep things simple and let the quality of seasonal ingredients shine through. It's so easy, enjoyable, and affordable to indulge your cravings for fresh fruits and vegetables this time of year.

    Healthy Summer Produce

    For anyone who enjoys food and cooking, summer offers the finest ingredients—fresh local produce from the garden, farmers' market, and grocery—to make any dish superlative. The key is to keep things simple and let the quality of seasonal ingredients shine through. It's so easy, enjoyable, and affordable to indulge your cravings for fresh fruits and vegetables this time of year.

    Healthy Summer Produce

    For anyone who enjoys food and cooking, summer offers the finest ingredients—fresh local produce from the garden, farmers' market, and grocery—to make any dish superlative. The key is to keep things simple and let the quality of seasonal ingredients shine through. It's so easy, enjoyable, and affordable to indulge your cravings for fresh fruits and vegetables this time of year.

                  <h2 class="article-section-title">Healthy Summer Produce ¼</h2>                
                  <p>For anyone who enjoys <strong>food and cooking</strong>, summer offers the finest ingredients—fresh local produce from the garden, farmers' market, and grocery—to make any dish superlative. The key is to keep things simple and let the quality of <a href='#'>seasonal ingredients</a> shine through. It's so easy, enjoyable, and affordable to indulge your cravings for fresh fruits and vegetables this time of year.</p>

                                        var CKL = {} || CKL;
                                        CKL.related_content = CKL.related_content || [];

                            </div>
                            <div class="related-articles__story">
                                <a href="http://example.com" class="related-articles__media">
                                    <img src="http://placehold.it/400x300" alt="This is an img alt text">
                                </a>
                                <div class="related-articles__body">
                                        <span class="related-articles__text-sm">category name</span>
                            
                                    <a href="http://example.com" class="related-articles__title">How to Make Superfast Dinner Salads</a>
                            
                                        <a href="http://example.com" class="link-with-arrow link-with-arrow--fresh related-articles__text-sm related-articles__cta">buy now</a>
                                    <script type="text/javascript">
                                        var CKL = {} || CKL;
                                        CKL.related_content = CKL.related_content || [];

                                            url: "http://example.com",
                                            alt: "This is an img alt text",
                                            title: "How to Make Superfast Dinner Salads",
                                            category: "category name",
                                            cta: "buy now"
                                        });
                                    </script>
                                </div>
                            </div>

                  <h2 class="article-section-title">Healthy Summer Produce</h2>                
                  <p>For anyone who enjoys food and cooking, summer offers the finest ingredients—fresh local produce from the garden, farmers' market, and grocery—to make any dish superlative. The key is to keep things simple and let the quality of <a href='#'>seasonal ingredients</a> shine through. It's so easy, enjoyable, and affordable to indulge your cravings for fresh fruits and vegetables this time of year.</p>

    Eat Clean

    Recipe Print

    Back To Recipe Print Recipe
    time 22 Minutes
    Active Time 15 Minutes
    Yield 6 (serving size: 1 1/3 cups)

    How to Make It

    1. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Corporis velit aliquam repellat sit sint at unde, quaerat quae laboriosam error fugit explicabo suscipit voluptatem deserunt. Pariatur officiis dignissimos voluptatibus, veritatis.
    2. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Corporis velit aliquam repellat sit sint at unde, quaerat quae laboriosam error fugit explicabo suscipit voluptatem deserunt. Pariatur officiis dignissimos voluptatibus, veritatis.
    3. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Corporis velit aliquam repellat sit sint at unde, quaerat quae laboriosam error fugit explicabo suscipit voluptatem deserunt. Pariatur officiis dignissimos voluptatibus, veritatis.
    4. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Corporis velit aliquam repellat sit sint at unde, quaerat quae laboriosam error fugit explicabo suscipit voluptatem deserunt. Pariatur officiis dignissimos voluptatibus, veritatis.
    5. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Corporis velit aliquam repellat sit sint at unde, quaerat quae laboriosam error fugit explicabo suscipit voluptatem deserunt. Pariatur officiis dignissimos voluptatibus, veritatis.

    Healthy Summer Produce

    For anyone who enjoys food and cooking, summer offers the finest ingredients—fresh local produce from the garden, farmers' market, and grocery—to make any dish superlative. The key is to keep things simple and let the quality of seasonal ingredients shine through. It's so easy, enjoyable, and affordable to indulge your cravings for fresh fruits and vegetables this time of year.

    Originally published June 2016 on MyRecipes. Adapted with permission from Book Title, copyright 2015 by Author, Yumco Publishing Co., Inc.
    Source: http://example.com

    HTML

    									
										<article class="article recipe-print" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Recipe">
  <div class="recipe-print__header article__header">
  
  
      <div class="recipe-print__top fcenter frow frow--sb">
        <a class="back-link link-with-arrow-back" href="">Back To Recipe</a>
        <a class="btn btn--primary" href="javascript:window.print()">Print Recipe</a>
      </div>  
      <div class="ad ad-leaderboard" id="ad-leaderboard-responsive"></div>

    var tgx_ad_callback_ad_leaderboard_responsive = function (event, sizes, breakpoint, oldBreakpoint) {
        if (event === 'render' && this.id == '$ad_id') {

        }
        else if (event === 'remove') {

        }
        else if (event === 'rendered') {

        }
    };

    tgx_ad_slots.push(function(ads){

        ads.addSlot({
            id: 'ad-leaderboard-responsive',
            responsive: {
                sm: {sizes: ['300x50','320x50'], class: ['anchor-ad']},
                md: {sizes: ['728x90','101x1'], callback: tgx_ad_callback_ad_leaderboard_responsive },
                lg: {sizes: ['728x90','970x250','970x418','970x66','970x90','101x1'], callback: tgx_ad_callback_ad_leaderboard_responsive },
                xl: {sizes: ['728x90','970x250','970x418','970x66','970x90','101x1'], callback: tgx_ad_callback_ad_leaderboard_responsive }
            },
            position: 1,
            exclusive: true
        });

    });

</script>

                      <h2 class="article-section-title">Healthy Summer Produce</h2>                    
                      <p>For anyone who enjoys food and cooking, summer offers the finest ingredients—fresh local produce from the garden, farmers' market, and grocery—to make any dish superlative. The key is to keep things simple and let the quality of <a href='#'>seasonal ingredients</a> shine through. It's so easy, enjoyable, and affordable to indulge your cravings for fresh fruits and vegetables this time of year.</p>

                  </div>

</article>

    Recipe

    • Food
    • In Season
    • Summer Produce Guide

    Summer Produce Guide for the greatest summer ever

    time 22 Minutes
    Active Time 15 Minutes
    Yield 6 (serving size: 1 1/3 cups)
    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Excepturi officia, odio impedit sunt doloribus totam, obcaecati laudantium dolorum veniam molestias quaerat ipsam possimus asperiores fuga, pariatur et? Quasi, assumenda, numquam.
    Pasta Shrimp Mushrooms Easy Dinners
    Email
    Print

    Ingredients

    Pasta

    • This is a list item in an unordered list foo
    • This is a list item in an unordered list
    • This is a list item in an unordered list
    • This is a list item in an unordered list
    • This is a list item in an unordered list
    • This is a list item in an unordered list
    • This is a list item in an unordered list

    Sauce

    • This is a list item in an unordered list foo
    • This is a list item in an unordered list
    • This is a list item in an unordered list
    • This is a list item in an unordered list
    • This is a list item in an unordered list
    • This is a list item in an unordered list
    • This is a list item in an unordered list

    Nutrition Information

    • This is a list item in an unordered list foo
    • This is a list item in an unordered list
    • This is a list item in an unordered list
    • This is a list item in an unordered list
    • This is a list item in an unordered list
    • This is a list item in an unordered list
    • This is a list item in an unordered list
    1. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Corporis velit aliquam repellat sit sint at unde, quaerat quae laboriosam error fugit explicabo suscipit voluptatem deserunt. Pariatur officiis dignissimos voluptatibus, veritatis.
    2. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Corporis velit aliquam repellat sit sint at unde, quaerat quae laboriosam error fugit explicabo suscipit voluptatem deserunt. Pariatur officiis dignissimos voluptatibus, veritatis.
    3. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Corporis velit aliquam repellat sit sint at unde, quaerat quae laboriosam error fugit explicabo suscipit voluptatem deserunt. Pariatur officiis dignissimos voluptatibus, veritatis.
    4. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Corporis velit aliquam repellat sit sint at unde, quaerat quae laboriosam error fugit explicabo suscipit voluptatem deserunt. Pariatur officiis dignissimos voluptatibus, veritatis.
    5. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Corporis velit aliquam repellat sit sint at unde, quaerat quae laboriosam error fugit explicabo suscipit voluptatem deserunt. Pariatur officiis dignissimos voluptatibus, veritatis.

    How to Make It

    For anyone who enjoys food and cooking, summer offers the finest ingredients—fresh local produce from the garden, farmers' market, and grocery—to make any dish superlative. The key is to keep things simple and let the quality of seasonal ingredients shine through. It's so easy, enjoyable, and affordable to indulge your cravings for fresh fruits and vegetables this time of year.

    Originally published June 2016 on MyRecipes. Adapted with permission from Book Title, copyright 2015 by Author, Yumco Publishing Co., Inc.
    Also appeared in: Cooking Light, August, 2016, The Best of Cooking Light Cookbook.
    This pattern contains: organisms-recipe-header organisms-recipe-body

                              <h2 class="article-section-title">How to Make It</h2>                            
                              <p>For anyone who enjoys food and cooking, summer offers the finest ingredients—fresh local produce from the garden, farmers' market, and grocery—to make any dish superlative. The key is to keep things simple and let the quality of <a href='#'>seasonal ingredients</a> shine through. It's so easy, enjoyable, and affordable to indulge your cravings for fresh fruits and vegetables this time of year.</p>

            <div class="search-results-ad">
              <div class="ad ad-mtac ad-350x250 show-at-sm" id="ad-300x350"></div>
<script>
  var tgx_ad_callback_ad_300x350 = function (event, sizes, breakpoint, oldBreakpoint) {
      if (event === 'render' && this.id == 'ad-300x350') {
      }
      else if (event === 'remove') {
      }
      else if (event === 'rendered') {
      }
  };

  tgx_ad_slots.push(function(ads){
      ads.addSlot({
          id: 'ad-300x350',
          responsive: {
              md: {sizes: ['300x250'], callback: tgx_ad_callback_ad_300x350 },
              lg: {sizes: ['300x250'], callback: tgx_ad_callback_ad_300x350 },
              xl: {sizes: ['300x250'], callback: tgx_ad_callback_ad_300x350 }
          },

          position: 1,
          defer: 150,
          trackview: true
      });

  });
</script>
            </div>
